alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Suwannee, northwestern Hamilton and southwestern Echols Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong and slow moving thunderstorm near Blue Springs, or near Jennings, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Blue Springs and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
